meanings.sent1: The unweeting child wandered off in the park, unaware of the danger.
meanings.sent2: She felt unweeting about the surprise party planned for her.
meanings.sent3: The unweeting puppy chased its own tail, oblivious to the chaos around.
meanings.sent4: His unweeting behavior led to many misunderstandings with his friends.
meanings.sent5: The unweeting driver missed the turn, causing a delay in the journey.

meanings.sent1: The unweeting student struggled with the difficult math problem.
meanings.sent2: She remained unweeting of the changes happening in the company.
meanings.sent3: The unweeting explorer mistook a rock for a rare gem.
meanings.sent4: His unweeting decision to invest in the stock market led to losses.
meanings.sent5: The unweeting tourist got lost in the unfamiliar city streets.
